Title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison
Genre: Animation, Action, Comedy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Actors: Junko Takeuchi, Chie Nakamura, Rikiya Koyama, Kazuhiko Inoue
Plot: Naruto's battle to reclaim his honor begins! Naruto is convicted of a serious crime he didn't commit and is sent to the inescapable prison, Hozuki Castle. The warden, Mui, quickly seals ...
